timeline.bodyText:
wow. should we have a lint about return statements in finally clauses? @pq @munificent
Determining which return statement should actually apply in this case is a bit confusing.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText:
I like that idea. I can't imagine why I typed "return" in the first place but I certainly didn't want it. Note the final statement in the protected block is a return, but you might not be able to determine that all the time.
Thanks for the review! Looks like I have a problem in the build script, which I'll fix.
replies.author: stevemessick

timeline.message: Fix script; add repo for JB annotations

timeline.bodyText: Is this change leftover from working on jxbrowser stuff? Or is it necessary for dealing with the jxbrowser files that are in your directory but not committed?
timeline.author: helin24
